name: Pong 2.0 (Pixel Motion)
description:
Start Game:

Please Fill out Player 1 and 2 name and Set No. of Goals (Target).

Choose Any Difficulty Level to start Game.

Press Escape to Return to Menu

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Player 1 (Left) : W & S to move Vertically

Player 2 (Right) : Up & Down Arrow to move Vertically

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

This is just a clone of old retro game Pong Made in Unity it is my first Published Game.

I hope i'll get some great feedback and try to learn from your feedback .

Peace!
